err.doc: Attempt to disassemble a circuit entity which does not exist.

err.msg: RC cache must be deactivated in this mode\n
err.doc: Disassembly modes which involve manipulation of hierarchy require that the RC be deactivated.

err.msg: Connector '%s' is power supply AND ground\n
err.doc: The given external connector has been detected as both Vdd and Vss. This error is fatal.

err.msg: No VDD signal in the circuit\n
err.doc: No Vdd power supply has been identified in the circuit to disassemble. This error is not fatal, however, it is recommended to check the power supply configuration.

err.msg: No VSS signal in the circuit\n
err.doc: No Vss power supply has been identified in the circuit to disassemble. This error is not fatal, however, it is recommended to check the power supply configuration.
The specified file cannot be opened. Check disk space and access privileges. This error may be fatal.
The specified file cannot be closed. Check disk space and access privileges.
The specified mutual exclusion constraint has no correspondance in the circuit to disassemble.

err.msg: Can't name toplevel %s in Blackbox mode\n
err.doc: Attempt to rename the top-level figure using a name which is already in use.

err.msg: Figure '%s' has no transistors and no instances\n
err.doc: Circuit contains no elements to disassemble.
In hierarchical disassembly mode, if a no-leaf figure contains a mixture of transistors and instances then the result may not be as expected.

err.msg: Signal '%s' is not driven in behavioural figure\n
